ygData.subject: Re: clothes and accessories and stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe of what I have heard that you will look different depending on what you are wearing, chainmail, leather armor, and what weapon you are using etc..
ygData.messageBody:
I believe of what I have heard that you will look different depending on
what you are wearing, chainmail, leather armor, and what weapon you are
using etc.. It's just not a main issue during beta but I suppose it will
be added sometime before or during phase 4, if not then it should be in
the retail.. :)

- Avron Vallengard -


On Fri, 11 Dec 1998, Qwertyas wrote:

> From: "Qwertyas" <qwertyas@...>
>
> In the Journal at eqss you can read that cloyhes and stuff dont show up on your characters body. Think there will be a change of this in the "real" verision or will there always be like that?
>
> /Qwertyas
>
